greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = A002865(n-k)*A000203(k), 1 <= k <= n.
comment: T(n,k) is the total number of cubic cells added at n-th stage to the right prisms whose bases are the parts of the symmetric representation of sigma(k) in the polycube described in A221529.
Partial sums of column k gives the column k of A221529.
example: For n = 6 the calculation of every term of row 6 is as follows:
The sum of row 6 is 2 + 6 + 4 + 7 + 0 + 12 = 31, equaling A138879(6).
mathematica: Table[A340583[n, k], {n, 1, 12}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Robert P. P. McKone_, Jan 25 2021 *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 15 2021
